short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stranger Things wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Stranger Things background. Stranger Things wallpaper themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Stranger Things wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Choose a random Stranger Things background or set a favorite through the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated search bar utilizing Google.
4. Quick links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Convenient access to your most visited sites.
8. Quick access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing options to social media.
13. Quick access for downloading wallpapers.
14. Direct link to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Stranger Things new tab.
